## AccessControlList type

Represents an Access Control List which is used to restrict access to a container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AccessControlList = {
    $type?: string;
    AccessControlEntries?: Array<AccessControlEntry>;
};
```

**References:** [AccessControlEntry](./open-api-client.accesscontrolentry.md)
